content: this is a crochet pattern for a tapestry crochet zipper pouch allison this pouch is quite fast and easy to make and would work great for your cards money or some small thingies it goes very well together with the tapestry crochet keychain allison the pattern includes - written instructions in us terms - abbreviations used - pattern notes - photo instructions - links to additional photo tutorials on my website for all stitches used in this pattern - photo instructions showing how to sew in a zipper and attach lining materials and tools you will need - yarn any thin yarn will work i used madame tricot paris almina 8/4 mercerized cotton 100% 50 g = 169 m colors pink and black - crochet hook size recommended on your yarn label i used a 2 0 mm hook - tapestry needle - a zipper and lining if you wish to add it measurements 11 5 x 8 5 cm you can purchase a pdf pattern at the nordic hook shop here 1 join nordic hook club to get all ad-free patterns stitch tutorials and e-books in pdf format here 2 1 https //nordichookshop com/products/tapestry-crochet-zipper-pouch-allison 2 https //nordichookclub com/sign-up/
